scripts.install:all: npm install --no-workspaces --prefix packages/shared && npm install --no-workspaces --prefix apps/api && npm install --no-workspaces --prefix apps/worker && npm install --no-workspaces --prefix apps/web
scripts.dev: npm run dev --no-workspaces --prefix apps/web & npm run dev --no-workspaces --prefix apps/api & npm run dev --no-workspaces --prefix apps/worker
